entry.value: SELECT SOURCE_DIRECTORY srcDir, PROCESSED_DIRECTORY procDir,UNPROCSSED_DIRECTORY unProcDir,ACK_DIRECTORY ackDir,WORKING_DIRECTORY workingDir FROM TPMS.T_QATP_MAPPING WHERE FILE_TYPE=:FILE_TYPE AND T_AGENCY_ID =:T_AGENCY_ID AND FILE_FORMAT =:FILE_FORMAT

SELECT FIELD_TYPE, CHARACTER_ENCODING characterEncoding,FIELD_NAME,START_POSITION,END_POSITION,VALIDATION_TYPE,VALIDATION_VALUE,FIELD_INDEX_POSITION,IS_POJO_VALUE,DEFAULT_VALUE FROM TPMS.T_QATP_MAPPING_DETAIL T_QATP_MAPPING_DETAIL INNER JOIN TPMS.T_QATP_MAPPING T_QATP_MAPPING ON T_QATP_MAPPING_DETAIL.T_QATP_MAPPING_PK_ID=T_QATP_MAPPING.ID WHERE T_AGENCY_ID =:T_AGENCY_ID ORDER BY FIELD_INDEX_POSITION
SELECT COUNT(FILE_NAME) FROM TPMS.T_LANE_TX_CHECKPOINT WHERE FILE_NAME=:FILE_NAME AND XFER_XMIT_STATUS =:XFER_XMIT_STATUS
SELECT COUNT(XFER_FILE_NAME) FROM TPMS.T_XFER_CONTROL WHERE XFER_FILE_NAME=:XFER_FILE_NAME
SELECT AGENCY_ID FROM TPMS.T_AGENCY WHERE FILE_PREFIX=:FILE_PREFIX

SELECT AGENCY_ID, AGENCY_NAME, AGENCY_SHORT_NAME,CONSORTIUM, DEVICE_PREFIX, IS_HOME_AGENCY, SCHEDULED_PRICING_FLAG, CLMM_ADJ_ALLOWED, CURRENT_IAG_VERSION, IS_IAG_STYLE_RECIPROCITY, CALCULATE_TOLL_AMOUNT, FILE_PREFIX, PARENT_AGENCY_ID, UPDATE_TS, STMT_DESCRIPTION, STMT_DELIVERY, STMT_FREQUENCY, STMT_DEFAULT_DURATION, APPEND_IMAGES, INVOICE_ENAVLED FROM TPMS.T_AGENCY

INSERT INTO TPMS.T_TRAN_DETAIL (LANE_TX_ID, TX_EXTERN_REF_NO, TX_TYPE_IND, TX_SUBTYPE, TOLL_SYSTEM_TYPE, TOLL_REVENUE_TYPE, ENTRY_TX_TIMESTAMP, ENTRY_PLAZA_ID, ENTRY_LANE_ID, ENTRY_TX_SEQ_NUMBER, ENTRY_DATA_SOURCE, ENTRY_VEHICLE_SPEED, PLAZA_AGENCY_ID, PLAZA_ID, LANE_ID, TX_DATE, TX_TIMESTAMP, LANE_MODE, LANE_STATE, LANE_SN, DEVICE_NO, DEVICE_CODED_CLASS, DEVICE_IAG_CLASS, DEVICE_AGENCY_CLASS, TAG_AXLES, ACTUAL_CLASS, ACTUAL_AXLES, EXTRA_AXLES, PLATE_STATE, PLATE_NUMBER, PLATE_TYPE, PLATE_COUNTRY, READ_PERF, WRITE_PERF, PROG_STAT, COLLECTOR_NUMBER, IMAGE_CAPTURED, VEHICLE_SPEED, SPEED_VIOLATION, RECIPROCITY_TRX, IS_VIOLATION, IS_LPR_ENABLED, FULL_FARE_AMOUNT, DISCOUNTED_AMOUNT, UNREALIZED_AMOUNT, EXT_FILE_ID, RECEIVED_DATE, ACCOUNT_TYPE, ACCT_AGENCY_ID, ETC_ACCOUNT_ID, ETC_SUBACCOUNT, DST_FLAG, IS_PEAK,FARE_TYPE,UPDATE_TS ) values (:LANE_TX_ID, :TX_EXTERN_REF_NO, :TX_TYPE_IND, :TX_SUBTYPE, :TOLL_SYSTEM_TYPE, :TOLL_REVENUE_TYPE, :ENTRY_TX_TIMESTAMP, :ENTRY_PLAZA_ID, :ENTRY_LANE_ID, :ENTRY_TX_SEQ_NUMBER, :ENTRY_DATA_SOURCE, :ENTRY_VEHICLE_SPEED, :PLAZA_AGENCY_ID, :PLAZA_ID, :LANE_ID, :TX_DATE, :TX_TIMESTAMP, :LANE_MODE, :LANE_STATE, :LANE_SN, :DEVICE_NO, :DEVICE_CODED_CLASS, :DEVICE_IAG_CLASS, :DEVICE_AGENCY_CLASS, :TAG_AXLES, :ACTUAL_CLASS, :ACTUAL_AXLES, :EXTRA_AXLES, :PLATE_STATE, :PLATE_NUMBER, :PLATE_TYPE, :PLATE_COUNTRY, :READ_PERF, :WRITE_PERF, :PROG_STAT, :COLLECTOR_NUMBER, :IMAGE_CAPTURED, :VEHICLE_SPEED, :SPEED_VIOLATION, :RECIPROCITY_TRX, :IS_VIOLATION, :IS_LPR_ENABLED, :FULL_FARE_AMOUNT, :DISCOUNTED_AMOUNT, :UNREALIZED_AMOUNT, :EXT_FILE_ID, :RECEIVED_DATE, :ACCOUNT_TYPE, :ACCT_AGENCY_ID,:ETC_ACCOUNT_ID,:ETC_SUBACCOUNT,:DST_FLAG,:IS_PEAK,:FARE_TYPE,:UPDATE_TS)
